  • Constructor Details

    • CommentService

      public CommentService()

  • Method Details

    • getCommentsByPost

      public List<Comment> getCommentsByPost(String cookie, UUID postId)
      Retrieve comments for a post for an authorized session.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      postId - id of the post to fetch comments for
      Returns:
      list of Comment DTOs including like counts and whether the current user liked each comment
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - when the session is invalid or missing

    • createComment

      public Comment createComment(String cookie, UUID postId, Content content)
      Create a new comment on a post authored by the account associated with the provided session cookie.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      postId - id of the post to comment on
      content - content payload for the new comment
      Returns:
      created Comment DTO including metadata and like counts
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when the post cannot be found
      InvalidCredentialsException - when the session is invalid or missing

    • editComment

      public Comment editComment(String cookie, UUID commentId, Content content)
      Edit an existing comment. Only the author may edit their comment.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      commentId - id of the comment to edit
      content - new content for the comment
      Returns:
      updated Comment DTO
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when the comment cannot be found
      InvalidCredentialsException - when the session is invalid or missing

    • deleteComment

      public void deleteComment(String cookie, UUID commentId)
      Delete an existing comment authored by the requesting account.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      commentId - id of the comment to delete
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when the comment cannot be found
      IllegalActionException - when the requesting account is not the author

    • likeComment

      public Comment likeComment(String cookie, UUID commentId)
      Add a like from the current user to the specified comment.
      Parameters:
      cookie - raw Cookie header value used to validate the session
      commentId - id of the comment to like
      Returns:
      Comment DTO reflecting the updated like count and whether the current user liked it
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when the comment cannot be found
